alert.note: Alert for Gaines (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 8:23PM CDT until June 07 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM CDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL ANDREWS AND SOUTH CENTRAL GAINES COUNTIES... At 823 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Andrews, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public report of quater size hail near the city of Andrews. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Andrews, Florey and Andrews County Airport. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
